backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing admin-gated blog CRUD and user profiles with access control and simple post storage in Maps.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module returning an empty upgraded state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing blog-related frontend features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend components and pages for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all public and admin pages and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Gate component that checks Internet Identity admin status before rendering protected admin pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCon: Renders blog post content blocks, supporting text and inline images parsed from JSON.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostEdi: A block-based blog editor allowing users to add, reorder, update, and remove text and image blocks, syncing changes as JSON.
frontend/src/components/inquiry/InquiryS: Button showing inquiry list count and navigating to the inquiry page with a cart icon badge.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying contact info, navigation links, address, and social icons with dynamic year handling.
frontend/src/components/site/Header.tsx: Sticky site header with logo, navigation buttons, contact info, and an inquiry summary button.
frontend/src/components/site/HomeBackgro: Full-screen autoplaying background video with error handling and a gradient fallback.
frontend/src/components/site/Interactive: Canvas-based animated background rendering floating hardware parts with parallax and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/site/PageTransit: Wrapper applying a fade-in animation to page content.
Root layout combining background canvas, header, routed content with transitions, and footer.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Static contact configuration including phone numbers, email, address, and map URLs.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Site metadata constants such as name, URL, and description.
frontend/src/data/catalog.ts: Defines product categories with icons, IDs, names, and descriptions for catalog display.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Generates gallery items from static image paths using inferred metadata and provides category extraction.
frontend/src/data/inventory.ts: Defines a Product interface and a hardcoded inventory list of construction materials with ids, categories, and image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlog.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching blog posts, categories, and tags using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogAdmin.ts: Defines mutations for creating, updating, deleting blog posts and checking admin status through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInquiry.ts: Wraps the inquiry store, exposing item management functions and a total count helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook managing login, logout, stored identity, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty object for future backend-integrated queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and custom design tokens for light and dark themes including colors and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity provider around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/BlogAdminEditPage.tsx: Admin page for creating and editing blog posts, loading existing data, handling form state, and submitting mutations.
frontend/src/pages/BlogAdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, sorting, editing, and deleting blog posts with loading states and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays all blog posts with search, category, and tag filtering plus navigation to individual posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a single blog post with metadata and rendered content, including loading and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays products within a selected category and allows managing an inquiry list with quantity controls.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact information page featuring phone, email, operational hours, and location details in card sections.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a filterable product gallery with category buttons and product cards, plus a contact CTA section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, category grid linking to product pages, and a contact CTA.
frontend/src/pages/InquiryPage.tsx: Shows the user's inquiry list with quantity controls, removal options, and navigation to the lead form.
frontend/src/pages/LeadFormPage.tsx: Contains a customer details form with validation and saves the inquiry submission before navigating to success.
frontend/src/pages/LeadSuccessPage.tsx: Displays a confirmation message after form submission and clears the inquiry list.
frontend/src/state/inquiryStore.ts: Zustand store managing inquiry items with add, increment, decrement, remove, and clear actions, persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/storage/submissions.ts: Utilities to save, retrieve, and clear lead form submissions stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/styles/effects.css: Defines 3D text and card hover effects along with responsive interaction styling.
frontend/src/utils/galleryInference.ts: Provides functions to parse filenames, generate display names, and infer product categories using keyword scoring for gallery items.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including support for hash-based routing and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s current requirements, architecture notes, and features, defining the site’s goals and build state metadata.
